meanings.definition: To dry (clothes) partially by machine before finishing by ironing or hanging.
meanings.sent1: I always roughdry my jeans before hanging them up to finish drying completely.
meanings.sent2: She roughdries her towels in the dryer for a short time before letting them air dry.
meanings.sent3: After roughdrying his socks, he accidentally shrunk them in the dryer!
meanings.sent4: The chef decided to roughdry the pasta before adding the final touches to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The painter roughdried the canvas before adding the final layers of paint.

meanings.definition: Not smoothed or finished with a smooth surface; rough.
meanings.sent1: The roughdry surface of the table made it difficult to write on.
meanings.sent2: Her hands felt roughdry after working in the garden without gloves.
meanings.sent3: The roughdry texture of the blanket made it cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: The old building had a roughdry exterior that added to its charm.
meanings.sent5: The cat's tongue felt roughdry as it licked its fur clean.
